channel.title: PCA on Jaidev's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PCA on Jaidev's Blog

item.title: Organizing a Bookshelf with Multivariate Analysis
item.description: I have recently moved from Pune to Delhi. I had spent only a year in Pune, having moved there from Mumbai, where I lived for three years. Whenever I move, the bulk of my luggage consists of books and clothes. My stay in Pune was just a transition, so I never bothered to unpack and store all my stuff too carefully. Thus, a corner of my bedroom in my Pune apartment always looked like this: The actual volume of books that I carried from Pune to Delhi is about twice of what is seen in the picture.
